DOC.brief_summary: Various approach , include surgical non-surgical management propose keratoconus . One surgical procedure Intrastromal Corneal Ring implantation design achieve refractive readjustment flatten cornea . There different model Intrastromal Corneal ring available : intrastromal corneal ring segment ( ICRS ) Keraring intrastromal corneal continuous ring ( ICCR ) like Myoring . Most study two type ring implantation outcomes retrospective case series . Thus , Randomized Clinical Trial study design aim Comparing visual refractive outcome complication insertion Myoring versus Keraring use Femtosecond laser . Keratoconus patient compound myopic astigmatism meet inclusion criterion randomly allocate Keraring Myoring group . Subsequently , clinical outcome two group compare one,3 6 month surgery .
DOC.criteria: keratoconus patient : age 20 40 corneal thickness > 380 micron mean keratometry 44 60 D clear central cornea Patients discontinue contact lenses 3 week prior exam contact lenses tolerance 20/200 < visual acuity < 20/30 Positive pregnancy test Breastfeeding History glaucoma , cataract , vernal atopic keratoconjunctivitis History previous ophthalmologic surgery , keratorefractive surgery operative eye Dry eye Corneal stromal disorder History herpetic keratitis Pellucid marginal degeneration Corneal graft Retinal disorder Nystagmus uncooperative disposition Neuroophthalmologic disorder Intraocular pressure < 10 mmHg > 21 mmHg Patients autoimmune , connective tissue disorder , diabetes immunosuppressive drug user Hyperopia
